content.detailedDescription: I was observing the milky way and the clear night sky (no moon) at about 10pm when i noticed a bright light appear almost directly overhead. it was a continuous light for some 15 seconds, no flashing lights to indicate an aircraft; it was more like a bright star. there was no sound associated with the light. then it just stopped. it did not fade out or move, it just stopped shining. there were no clouds that evening and no moon. about 5 to 7 minutes later the light appeared again in the same area, stayed illuminated for a few seconds and was out again. i did not see it reappear for the 15 minutes i remained outside. i know it may sound a rather pedestrian sighting, but in my 20 years of living in the country far from the light pollution of the city i have never seen anything like this. had there been cloud cover i could maybe dismiss it as a plane or satellite (actually it was much too bright for a satellite compared to the ones i have seen in the past) making an intermittent appearance through the clouds. but even a conventional aircraft would have covered significant distance in that 5 to 7 minute interval. i sensed this was out of the ordinary when it first appeared. i will keep looking.
content.summary: High altitude bright lights overhead

content.detailedDescription: We were out looking for the northern lights and looked straight up and saw a faint triangle shaped object moving north to south at a pretty good speed. it had 5 lights on it and it made no sound and we could not see any evidence of any contrail.  i would estimate that this object was fairly close to the ground, if you would place your arm straight out the object would be about the size of your thumb. we only saw it for about 30 seconds. there were hazy clouds to the east of us and a few overhead so it was hard to see a good black sky. we figure it had to be some sort of military craft. it moved on to the south and we lost sight of it after about 30 seconds because of the hazy sky.
content.summary: Triangle shape, 5 lights, v-shape.

content.detailedDescription: i my sister and my cousin went out to smoke, then my sister looked to the  sky and tell us to look too.We saw a small triangle and orange light around. first i said that is a moon, but my sister said that it mast be in a different form we watched it 5 minutes and then its disappeared. we start to talk about this and then my cousin said that its may be a ufo. we continued watch the sky and then after some thing like a 10 minutes it came back.When its came back it was much higher and disappeared after a minute. when its came back again it was some thing like a 15 minutes later and its moved to left and its became to be more white some time nothing will change after that its disappeared again, when its came back its moved right and now it was only oval shaped light than its start to turn around itself my count thought she was imagining it she asked if we sow it too, we sow. then the light became stronger and we sow two small circles and around them light. then its began to move toward us, we began to fear and ran to home.When we came home we told to my father what we sow, he didn't believed us so he came with us out side to see it. when we came back it was same thing like a7 minutes later and it wasn't there we wait but it didn't come back. was it a real ufo?
content.summary: It was a small  orange triangle high in the sky  after some time it dissapeared  then came back and started moving.

content.detailedDescription: I need help was going to visit my brother in another state. i would prefer talking to someone. i am sure i was drugged. i looked from the bus and was moved to a van.  they said we had missed our bus.Saw the ufo's from the van.  they were 3 circleing a field as if looking for something going across the field. in a patten.  i lost sight as we kept going.
content.summary: 3 hovering the ground about 20 feet off the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back steps looking up at orin's belt star cluster and watched a air plane dissect it saw the normal making lights and at normal jet airliner speeds about three min's later i saw off to the south and east of orin's belt the unknown object then it crossed crossed orin's belt in less than a min could see a darker area in front of a the object with a bright glow at the rear there was no standard air line lights could not distinguish the real shape due to its height at least 50.000 feet if not a bit higher ,the sun had not started to raise yet, but i don't think it was a satellite ass the light was coming off the south end of the object not the eastern facing side as i could make out a darker area in front of the glow of the rear of the object ,but not enough light to make out the real shape of the object and the rear was bright than an air-force jet with full afterburner engaged. it kept its course till i lost it in the tree line at the edge of my property . if i had to guess it was traveling at 3,000 to 5,000 miles per hour  

 as to what it was i cant say but it wasn't any jet i have ever seen as one no running lights and  two , it was too bright of a light to have been the afterburners of a military jet moving at least 10 times faster than most jets due that i see and wasn't landing lights 

   5  min's after i saw a meteorite streak from south to north at a slower speed by at least half the speed the object was moving
content.summary: Saw a light move across orion's belt moved the distance in less than a min.

content.detailedDescription: After noticing some strange diamond-shaped and crescent-shaped objects @midnight, i decided to keep watching. suddenly, from a high altitude, i saw this row of four lights beaming bright descend and then come to a complete stop. there was enough moonlight to make out the superstructure; it was a double parabolic object with a significant bulge in the center. it was only @2000 feet from my top floor apartment, which faces east toward new jersey, near the delaware river.These were bright solid oval lights;two white and two orange; a pair on each side of the center line.It did not move for the five minutes i observed it until i closed my blinds. i was completely baffled by the sight of something as big as two or three aircract carriers suspended in midair.I then realized i was beinf backlit by my tv set in the window and thought they might see me; so i got scared, closed the blinds, shut off the tv, took my sleeping pill and went to sleep. i had attempted a video using my sony handycam, but realized the next day that i forgot to press the red record button; i must have been spooked to do such a stupid thing since i knew how to take videos and in fact had taken some that same day.I probably should have stayed with the viewing, but i was getting tired.I also probably should have gone out to the train station area that it was over and signaled it with a flashlight and maybe it would have come down and i could have boarded it; i was very interested in the anti-gravity mechanism.But i then got caught with an overwhelming sense of fear and checked that.
content.summary: Saw a double parabolic-shaped object descend from high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching shooting stars when my boys called my attention to the "foo". it was a goldish pulsating sphere that went over abingdon,va at 12:01 am aug 3, 2010. although the boys have seen one before here farther off after the major siting here 6/23/ 2010, they had never seen one this close. it scared the younger for a bit as he believed me, but had never been able to dicern for himself that it wasnt from here.It again traveled in the rough same vector crossing over i-81 to roughly traverse and follow maine street in abingdon, va. this is the fourth seen at close range of this specific type, 3 gold and one red in the three years i have been here. i am an ex army recon and vehicle identity specialist................It's not ours (meaning human).
content.summary: Watching shooting stars with my boys. goldish pulsing sphere as in the june 23, 2008, following same basic track as "foo fighter" then. although they had seen one and i posted pic on the webboard before, this was as close as the initial on 6/23/08.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was in the south east part of detroit. i was walking in the street. i have a habit of looking at the sky all the time because i'm aware of 
the ufo phenomena and i've been interested in et for 5 years. 
2.I looked at the sky and noticed 6 objects that were chaotically moving then made a formation of 6 objects that looked like circles and in the triangular formation went faster. nothing moves like that. 
it couldn't be terrestrial object or
atmosphere phenomena. nothing moves like that. 
i wanted to take a pict but it was very dark and objects were flying fast.. 
i lost a sight went object accelerated their speed. they made a formation and accelerated so rapidly..
content.summary: I was in the south detroit area. i was looking at the sky and noticed 6 circle objects moving in the sky. then they made a triangular formation and went fast.

content.detailedDescription: My husband had traveled to ennis mt. to visit neice.They were out fishing and took pics,not seeing anything on them until they were put on p.C.
content.summary: Metallic disc.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, i'm not certain it was a ufo causing the unique cross formation in a humongous cumulonimbus cloud over castle rock and park, co on saturday, july 31, 2010...But this is a description of what my husband and i saw...

while driving home from a movie, heading west on founders parkway, stopped at the first stoplight west of i-25, as i looked up at the horizon filled with a multitude of humongous shimmering, luminescent cumulonimbus clouds, i said, "look at that!!"

"that" was a perfect horizontal parallelogram - just above the horizon - (holding my hand at arm's length the height was about the size of my thumb nail and the width about 8") and a perfect vertical parallelogram starting approximately 2/3 the width to the right...Making a horizontal cross shape...(the height with arm outstretch was about 4" and the width the same thumb nail size) i've attached an image i created that is very similar to the one we saw.

and, you could see clear blue sky through the cross shape in the cloud.

i asked for my husband's cell phone to take a snapshot and just as i was about to take it's picture the stoplight turned green and we had to proceed. i asked him to make the first right hand turn, but we couldn't due to traffic. by the time we were able to see the exact location again, about 2 minutes later, the cross formation was gone.

my husband thinks the wind could have done it, however, i've never heard of horizontal and intersected vertical parallelograms with 90 degree corners at the intersection with blue sky showing in the middle of huge, deep clouds before!

i've tried searching the internet for other notifications regarding the cross formation to no avail.

i'm just glad my husband actually saw it, too!
content.summary: Perfectly squared horizontal cross shape in humongous cumulonimbus clouds over castle rock, parker, co.

content.detailedDescription:
I always see interestin things out front of my home this would not be the first time. i seen a bright yellow liquid light super bright!! it was hovering right near the prision down the street from my home. i watched it hover for a few minuets and i seen it move finally so i ran after it. when i got to where i seen it it was gone. i got back to my house and a minuet later it was there again in the same spot. then it started to move away again and dissappeared. then it reappeared again in the same spot. this time it started moving towards my direction i proceded to watch it but it dissappeared behind the trees. this was blinking soooo fast!! and it wasnt very solid looking at all. the last time it dissappeared i seen fighter jest which wasnt to weir i always see alot of planes & such over my house. but then the jest kept comming honestly i seen over 10 jets searchng the same area and direction where i seen the craft. all the jets were searching the same paths as the ufo al of them. and the jets kept comming one after another looking for a really long time. i think thats why the ufo dissappeared for good once it went behind the trees there was on jet in the area nd a helacopter. i see comercial flights all the time so i know what the difference is between army planes & normal flights. this object was truly amazing and i swear it knew i was looking 4 it. 

i was out font of my home when i seen the object it wasnt very high in the sky either if it was  plane which no way in the world it was it was to low it would have fell out the sky and hit buildings/houses!

i always see things out front my home  & in my general area so im usually looking up in the sky. so i was just looking out into the sky and i seen this bright yello liquidish lighht vibrating like crazy and it hovered in one spot for a very long time. thats when i ran after it when i seen it moving an i determened that there was no way it was a conventional craft.

i thought it was very strange i didnt know what to think at first i honestly thought it was a ufo it wouldnt be the 1st time i have seen it so. it was just to stranget to be anything else!! the way it hovered vibrated and it was morphing.

i was very excited im very interested in ufo's i believe there is intelegent life. i always have i was just happy i got to witness somtin most never will. honestly i was trying to tell it in my head to do somtin definitive so iknow it wasnt somtin ordinary and i tryed to tell it to come closer. and the strange part was that i started comming closer the here came the jets and it dissappeared behind the trees. i wanted it to get away. it didnt feel negative.

i lost sight when it was traveling behind the trees and it was totally gone after that. it know it was being hunted.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saucer with lid type morphing shapes bright yellow light hovering dissappearing reappearing jets searching.

content.detailedDescription:
Date of sighting: aug 11, 2007, approximately 9 pm

while standing outside on my back deck facing north, i noticed a cluster of round, white lights north/northeast of my position.  from an outstretched arm, a dime would have easily covered it twice over.   there were many lights in the cluster of varying sizes, perhaps dozens, but i could not determine an exact number.  the cluster was very far away on the horizontal, perhaps hundreds of miles, and seemed very high in the sky ��� if you held your arm out at a 45 degree angle, it was higher.

from this cluster, smaller round lights would shoot out in varying directions; from my position, mostly east and west, and in horizontal or slightly downward trajectories. at least 9 smaller lights came from the cluster. these moving lights could be seen traveling for distances of sometimes 3 times the size of the cluster, sometimes up to 6 times the size, then vanish.  

the lights of the cluster and those moving from it were significantly different than the airplanes which were also present in the sky - the planes were much lower in altitude than the cluster, much closer to my position, and had running lights on.  

the sky was slightly dark and getting darker; the stars were beginning to come out, and were well out by the end of my viewing.

i watched it for at least 20 minutes, and then i went inside.  after about an hour, i went outside again, and it was gone. i did not think it was a star or satellite, and the position was not one in which planets appear.  i do not think it was a constellation, as the round lights of the cluster were so close together, and because of the smaller round lights ejected from it.  the round lights of both the cluster and those that were moving were slightly dimmer than the brightest surrounding stars, and did not twinkle, but maintained their appearance throughout
content.summary: Distant cluster of lights ejected small lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Date of sighting: aug 9, 2007, approximately 11 pm

while standing outside facing south and looking up at the sky, i heard a loud roar over my right shoulder and turned to look. out of nowhere, a triangle shaped object appeared and at the same time, the roar stopped. the object was completely silent for the duration of the sighting.  it passed over a tree which was west of me by about 40 feet and north of me about 50 feet, and it cleared the 60 foot tree by about 30 feet. the sky was dark, though not black, and airplanes (with running lights on) could be easily seen flying at high altitudes. there were no planes at low altitudes.  

the object���s shape was in a triangle.  the object was solid, as it had an outline and blocked out the stars behind it. it was very dark, with each point of the triangle having a rather dim white light, and in the center was a blinking red light. these lights turned off for a period of perhaps ��� minute, starting when it was about 60 or 70 feet south of the tree it had passed over, and just after i had moved my position to be almost directly under the object. the size of the object seemed to be about 25 to 30 feet long from the front point to the back, and the dimension across the back, as seen later, seemed to be somewhat shorter. 

it traveled very slowly (a human could have outrun it) on an even horizontal altitude toward the south/southwest, over pastures, a road and then a bean-field, for about ��� mile before i lost sight of it. i believe i may have lost sight of it due to the terrain, as there is an upward slope to the land. as it passed over the bean-field, i noted that the back end of the triangle seemed to be less than 10 feet high, and completely but dimly lit with white light. a few times, the land below and to its left glowed with a soft white diffused light. the sky above the illuminated land was also lighter than the sky above the object, but only up to the height of the object. my view was unobstructed during its path except for a few moments when 2 or 3 trees got in the way.  it did not pass in front of or behind these trees; merely my view was obstructed for a few moments.

duration of sighting may have been about 3 to 4 minutes, hard to tell, as i was rather stunned to see such a thing. i did not think it was an airplane, glider, helicopter or any other object i had ever seen before.
content.summary: Dark triangle object with lights seen at low altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from vermilion hills levittown to fairless hills (right around corner) and saw lights in the sky through the trees.  i turned the corner and had a clear view of the sky and saw a huge triangle with lights moving very slowly.  i didn't hear any sound.  i continued driving while looking up and couldn't believe that i was actually seeing this.  the thing was very very big.  i drove and turned around to go back with the intention of parking to watch it, but when i returned only moments later, it was gone.  i drove around looking for it, but couldn't find it again.
content.summary: Huge triangle moving very slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking outside with my brother through the front door which faces east south-east as he was leaving to go home.  as he was entering his vehicle, he asked what planet was above the big dipper, above the "pot" area which is formed by four stars and attached to the handle.  i looked up, which was to my north west and noticed a star-like object in the position he described but knew it could not be a planet since it was well above the elliptic.  it was not moving but it's star-like appearance along with the four other stars formed a pentagon shape. a few seconds later or so, we both witnessed it just fade away.  

we could hardly believe what we saw. after a few minutes he proceeded home after we also had seen a couple of meteors.  a few minutes later, i had told my wife and some other family members of what we saw and the meteors so they came outside.  what we saw after some minutes later were three meteors in just a few seconds streak across the sky from like south to north and one of them from east to west.  we kept looking at the night sky and i looked towards the big dipper again, and very soon, within about two minutes, i noticed another star-like object, but this time it was just below the handle of the big dipper and next to the upper left star of the "pot" of the dipper.  and this time it was moving very slowly diagonally towards the right and below. by then, my family also saw it, to include one of my nieces.  i and they could hardly believe it and i quickly had my wife call my brother since i could not keep my eyes off what i was seeing.  

he and his wife came over immediately but by then it had disappeared again.  he lives only about five minutes from my home.  by this time, we continued watching the area, and were particularly focused in the big dipper area.  we all then saw star-like objects again in and around the big dipper area. we saw them with the unaided eye and with three binoculars.  the star-like objects were moving slowly but were also changing in color and direction and in some cases, large directional and angle shifts.  each time they faded away or simply vanished.

the time line began around 10:55 pm when we saw the 1st star-like object - witnessed by two family members as noted above.

11:10pm - saw three meteors
11:11 - 11:15 pm - saw star-like object moving through big dipper diagonally as noted above.  witnessed by three family members.
11:26-11:38 pm - star-like object (s) around big dipper that was witnessed by seven family members.
11:45 - "shooting star", meteor through big dipper
11:56 - star-like object near third star in handle of big dipper proximal to the "pot". witnessed by seven
11:56 pm - 12:00 am - something moving up or shooting up from same third star as described above.  noticed by two family members
12:00 am - another meteor to right of big dipper.
12:06 am - something moving up, star like object, from between the 2nd and 3rd star of handle.
12:15 am - meteor through the center of big dipper from se to nw direction.
12:25 am - meteor through handle of big dipper.

this is the best of my recollection.  the times are quite accurate as i instructed one family member to record time of star-like objects and or meteors noted.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple star-like events over 1.5 hrs in and around big dipper constellation

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving tonight on i-8 heading home back to yuma.  i noticed a flashing orange light at a distance in front of us and started to take notice.  as we both watched we noticed more of the same lights come on.  i counted at times, a total of 6.  they were all bright orange in color and they would either flash on and off, flash simultaneously or completely stay off for a while.  a few would stay on for about a min or two and then completely go dark.  they lit up the whole sky.  however, you could mistake them for a star because they had no movement. (for most part)  they were stationary.  when they would move, they were never the same formation.  some did stay really close together, like 2 together and the rest far away.  one would be down low, two up high together, and another to the right.  these orange lights when they would flash, i would have to describe it as a sparkler, when you wave the fire in the sky and it leaves a trail.  that's what these lights did.  when they would move, you could see the light behind it slowly fade.  there were also white lights that you could explain as "dancing" as i have just read other reports.  they would start off close together and spread far apart.  there were lots of white lights at times and other times just two blinking at a time.  we watched these lights for about an hour.  there were just too many to be any sort of plane or helicopter.  and again, they stayed stationary and sometimes we had to just watch and wait until they would turn on again.  the sky would be black.  these lights are unexplainable, like nothing we have ever seen!!!  i started looking on my husbands phone on the internet and he jumped and said, "oh! there they are!" by this time we were almost home and the lights were behind us.  he saw 3 right in the sky in front of him up high.  they turned on - 1, 2, 3.  and that was it!!! i did try to record it from his video camera on his phone but it was way too dark to capture them and sometimes they stayed so faint you could barely see them.  you had to wait for them to "ignite" and then you could really see them!
content.summary: Arizona lights off of i-8 from phoenix into yuma.

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened sometime in the summer of 1967, probably in july or august.  it's been a while so i do not remember the month as well as i do the specific event.  i had been to a week long boy scout camp with a lot of my fellow scouts in harlingen, texas which is in far south texas.  we had chartered a bus for the trip.  the week long trip was almost over and on sunday night we returned by bus to our home camp, camp sol mayer, near menard, texas which is in the western part of the state.  we lived in san angelo which was still another 100 miles or so away.  we disembarked from the bus and threw our gear in a '57 chevy owned by one of the older boys. (i was 16 at the time.)  i remember some of the boys had dug up one of those big round wooden poles that support guard rails on the road side and drug it on to the bus along the way.  don't ask why.  i think you have to be a teenager to understand things like that.  we helped them unload it and then got in the '57 for the final leg of the trip home.

we drove two or three miles on farm to market 864, which is where camp sol mayer is located, and then turned west on highway 190.  we were tired and no one was talking much although there were four of us in the car.  we listened to koma from oklahoma city on the radio.  i was sitting in the back seat on the drivers side.  my friend in the seat beside me first commented on how big and bright and orange the moon was that night.  we each bent down for a look through his window and concurred thinking it was strange.  a few seconds later,i noticed a normal looking moon on my side of the car.  we all checked it out and then turned our attention to the one on the passenger side.  it looked like some celestial object, far off in the sky but much larger and brighter than i had ever seen the moon and very orange.  it did not show the "man in the moon" markings of craters we had all come to know.  we kept looking at it, talking about it and wondering what it could be.  it did not move, get brighter or dimmer.  it did not change in any way - it remained in the same part of the sky appearing, as i said, to be a celestial body.  

after about fifteen minutes, we turned north on highway 2084 which took us on to christoval and then san angelo.  when we made the turn, we realized the object had been much closer to us than we had thought and traveling at a speed matching ours.  it kept going west.  we watched it recede in the distance for another five to eight minutes until it was just a small speck in the western sky.  abruptly, it divided into three different colored lights, each shooting off in a different direction until they all disappeared.   this part was much like one of the ufos in speilberg's "close encounters", but i saw it for real years before the movie came out.

the next morning, the local newspaper had an article about numerous ufo sightings all over the midwest.  i said earlier that this was in 1967 when i was 16 and i think that is correct. the importance of details like dates have paled in comparison with the actual experience.  it is possible that it was 1966 and i was 15.  perhaps cross checking with midwest ufo sightings in those summers would verify the date.

regardless of the year, it has been over 40 years since i witnessed that event and i have never come up with an explanation which satisfies me.  to this day, i do not know what it was.
content.summary: Bright luminous orange shape in the sky, like moon but larger

content.detailedDescription:
I parked my vehicle for the night (having finished my shift), got out, and then stopped to look at the night sky. the stars are absolutely incredible here in the mountains. i wanted to orient to the milky way and pick out constellations and stars (a good way to relax).. when i noticed something moving across the sky. i often notice planes at night, so i did my own checklist - speed? flashing white/red light? approx. altitude? direction?

well the direction was off. most often in this area, planes travel from the east towards the west. this "craft" was traveling from the north towards the south, slightly east of the eastern sierra mountains (not on top of them) on a direct, straight course - no zig zags; not stationary; no acrobatics.

i could not discern the shape because it was so high up; there was no flashing light, only a continuous white light. it looked just like a pinprick star in the night sky, only moving. and it was moving much faster than an airplane.

as i watched it, and thought that it might be a ufo, i decided to reach out with my mind. i focused on it and thought, "who are you?"  a moment or two later it disappeared. like someone had hit a "stealth" switch. i looked ahead of its intended direction - nothing. i looked where it had been - nothing. i couldn't find it! and there had been no change; no light change, etc. just gone. 


(i posted this happened in july; it could have been late june. i'm sorry, i didn't write down the date.)
content.summary: High altitude/extremely fast object which disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were sitting outside saturday night, on our patio, which faces west.  the sky was mostly clear, but there were low scattered clouds moving in from the coast. i had just finished lighting the fire pit, and sat down to take off my shoes.
  my wife was talking about how wonderful the weather has been, i was looking at the sky thinking what a beautiful evening it was, when i noticed  a flash behind a group of clouds to the south west !! the object in question appeared from behind the clouds , and moved at a modest speed heading north it gained in intensity "brighter than venus has been". i thought at first it was a meteor, because it was extremely bright, but there was no trail that is usually associated with a meteor or shooting star .  the event was very quick, it went from super bright white, and then very quickly, dimmed to what appeared to be a very faint almost neon blue light, and then i lost sight through the trees and clouds. my wife never saw the object because of the trees behind her, and by the time we both hopped up to look over the trees it was gone.  i don,t think it was a satellite,  i have watched satellites cruise over many times, and i have never seen one light up like this object did.  i was pretty exited about what i had seen! this is the third time in my life i have seen something unexplainable to me.
content.summary: Bright white intense light turning very faint blue green.

content.detailedDescription: I notice a formation military jets (x6) flying south to north over green mountain res. in summit county.Took a picture as they pass over head, hit save and proceeded to look at the picture, pressing the zoom to see if the jets would be visible. as i zoomed in on the first set of vapor trails i imediately noticed an object inbetween the jets and turned the phone around to make sure there wasn't any dirt on ther lens, which there was not. i proceeded to zoom in to the maximum setting. the figure a appears to be much larger then the jets. i also noticed four other objects,two inbetween two other jets and two that seemed to be trailing behind one jets vapor trail perhaps a mile or two behind. all objects apprear to have the exact same shape, no vapor trails and all have sun glaring off of them. none of this was visible to the naked eye, as there several of us watching them as they passed over head (the jets);i had to move under a canopy to cut out the suns glare in the photo. by the time i had realized what was in the photo, the jets had already passed over green mountain to the north. one other thing to mention,i took the photo because it was unusual to see jets flying formation so high in altitude, but i was told by a friends who were on a boat that they had noticed approx. 6 more jets further to the west.
content.summary: 5 objects captured on high resolution camera/ phone flying with a formation of jets approx. 30-40,000ft

content.detailedDescription: Laying in bed looking out through a south facing bedroom window, a decorative half circle above the regular window, what appeared to be a large low flying square shape went by rather quickly. it had a slightly domed top with white and blue randomly flashing lights that completely surrounding the object.  holding out your arm a golf ball would have covered it up.  i quickly ran outside and saw it disappear in the distance.  it went in a straight line east to west. the complete event lasted less than two minutes. i see airplanes fly by in the distance regularly; but, never anything that comes close to this.
content.summary: Surrounded by blue and white flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: Standing at my back door i saw a very bright orange light moving from the west i shouted to my wife to see it and it came closer and slowed down it looked like the light was moving or spinning we both noticed an orange hook like light at the top of the ufo we lost site of it for a few seconds behind a house next door it then appeared again and headed nne at a very high speed and i lost site of it it made no sound.
content.summary: I saw a very bright orange light moving slowly from the west.

content.detailedDescription: About mid july  at approximately 845pm, i saw what i thought was a star, but it was to bright and low in the sky. after watching it for about 5 minutes, i noticed red,green,blue, and white lights slowly blinking around it. the next time i looked out the window the object was slightly closer. lights were blinking one on one off, then a large rotating white light, like a light house. this went for approximately another hour. at approximately 940pm the object started moving towards me. it had what looked like a smaller version of the space needle, the upper half of the object was kind of olive drab color, like military fatigues. the bottom was like you cut a golf ball in half , with a red circle painted on it. the red circle were lights though, and the white surface had what appeared like divits. the object made no noise at all. this has been happening every night at the same time for almost 3 weeks. some nights the object would move toward me, and some times in the object would move in opposite direction, away from me. when first started seeing this object i didn't know if it was a star, or a satelite.
content.summary: About mid-july i looked out my second floor apt window. i saw what i thought was a star, but it very bright and low in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking close to downtown detroit,  close to michigan ave. at about ten p.M. when a bright light caught my attention when i looked up. i saw a huge spherical object which had bright lights all around it. i stood there for about 2 minutes watching the object before it disappeared so quickly that i didn't even see it move and i was left confused wondering if it was ever even there. just wanted to report this in case there were similar sightings around that time, it would be nice to have some confirmation that this really did take place. i feel really baffled about the experience and told a close friend of mine who recommended that i should write to mufon in case there were others who shared the same experience.
content.summary: Walking and saw huge spherical moving object with bright lights which hovered for about 2 minutes before it quickly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was out with the dog taking pictures. i did not notice this until going through the images. i don't know what this could be but was pointed in mufons direction.
content.summary: Ufo in picture.

content.detailedDescription:
July 25, 2010: after driving with my family from colorado springs, colorado for around 12 hours, i had pulled off the road about 20 miles west of delta, utah on hwy 50.  it was 4:15 a.M.. as i turned off my truck, my oldest son, and my girlfriend woke up.  i was getting ready to take some of our things out of the cab of the truck, to make for more sleeping room, when i noticed what looked to be a low-flying airplane.  i saw white with green lights moving easterly parallel to the highway.  the trajectory seemed to be headed downwards around 10 to 15 degrees.  i thought it was strange for an airplane to be flying at that time, in the middle of nowhere, but i just wrote it off as normal until a huge, orange jet-fire, for lack of a better description appeared from the back of the lights.  the jet appeared very long.  it didn't look like flames, but like a torch, or something. i don't recall any acceleration of the lights, but it just sort of dissipated, and was gone. there was no sound.   i asked my girlfriend, and my son if they had seen this, and they saw the same thing.  i don't know if it could have been a meteor, or any other describable object, but the jet-fire tells me it wasn't.  
a week later i asked my son and girlfriend to draw what they saw, and all of our drawings were pretty much the same.
content.summary: Green and white light with orange fire/ jet flying very low, then just dissipated.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, son and myself were outside in our backyard last night and witnessed this same event, exactly the same including the apparent meteor.  this is what i posted earlier today to my friends and family -

we had a fire in the backyard, and saw a very bright light low on the southern horizon. it moved slowly toward the east, then stopped, brightened a lot, then dimmed to almost nothing, brightened a lot again and disappeared. probably was engaging warp drive :)

then a couple of minutes later, saw another one moving from south to northeast, thought maybe it was a plane but very high up. then it brightened a lot, dimmed, moved a bit further to the northeast then stopped and brightened up a lot, then stayed put for a long time.
content.summary: Corroborating earlier report "brilliant green object possible emits second white object."

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and three of my friends were outside a house smoking cigarettes. i was gazing up at the sky and noticed a point of light slowly moving. my first impression was that it was a plane, but it was not blinking and it was moving slowly. i get my friends' attention and point it out. they too first thought the same thing as i, then thought maybe it was a satellite. it was  not moving like a satellite either. it then stopped and turned from going north to east and approached a second ufo. they approached each other and one went westward and up while the other continued and seemingly entered a lower cloud which was lit up by light pollution. it dropped out of the cloud and disappeared. a few minutes later in the southern portion of a sky a bluer ufo (the others were pale and twinkly) started moving northeasterly. this one moved very slow. it moved directly west of us and stopped "in front of" a group of actual stars. it seemed to dim a bit and remained there. we got tired of straining our necks and eventually it faded out too. 

i think the ufos are trying to resemble stars. when they are motionless and if you happened to look up you would never notice any difference. and they were moving slow so if you just happened to look up you wouldn't even notice it moving! they have to be doing this on purpose and personally, i think its genius.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three star-like ufos moving slowly and stopping.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work at approx. 830 am. i was driving north on interstate 75 on the exit ramp to 275w. i saw the egg shaped aircraft in the north eastern sky. it had a reflective exterior and was very odd shaped compared to an airplane. it had an irregular body with a wider bottom. it as only hovering in the sky. no movement was seen. it stayed in the sky for a couple of minutes than vanished.
content.summary: Reflective egg shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on 6/24/2010. i was driving south toward cincinnati on route 4 (dixie hwy). the weather was sunny, hot and humid and there was no cloud in the sky. it all happened when i approached a stop light. it was still light out. i noticed a bright sphere in the sky flying under the moon. at first i didn't think anything of it until i realized how fast it was moving. in less than a minute it traveled below the moon on the left side of it and flew under it to the right side. once a again i was stopped a a red light when i saw this. then it did something unexpected.. i completely stopped moving. then dropped in the sky at a 60 degree angle (approx) then dropped straight down at a 90 degree angle. then it vanished. at first i thought it was just an airplane with the sun refecting off it, but it was about three times the size, and it moved faster than any airplane i have seen. i am a navy vertern and i have seen many jets flying and what they can do. i am basing the size on the porportion in size compared to the moon. and once again there was no clouds in the sky and it was still light out. this all happened while i sat at a red light.
content.summary: I was driving to work on 6/24/2010. i was driving south toward cincinnati on route 4 (dixie hwy).
